MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Falkirk, affecting properties in Southfield Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 6:53PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:27PM on 04 February 2021.
